Here's what I've come up with so far:

- 2 cups of laughter (preferably at your own expense)
- 1 tablespoon of adventure (preferably not on a weekend when you have plans)
- 3 teaspoons of good coffee (no, not that instant stuff, we're talking artisanal here)
- 1/4 teaspoon of tolerance for your partner's snoring (or in my case, my cat's incessant meowing)
- 1/2 cup of forgiveness (for when you spill coffee on your shirt or when your friend eats the last slice of pizza)
- A pinch of spontaneity (for when you decide to take a road trip at 3 am)
- And of course, a dash of sarcasm (for when life gets too serious)

But the real secret ingredient? Love. And not just the romantic kind, although that's nice too. I'm talking about the kind of love that makes you want to give your friend a good ol' fashioned hug, even when they've eaten the last slice of pizza.

So there you have it, my friend. The secret ingredients of a good life. Follow this recipe, and you'll be well on your way to becoming a master of the universe (or at least, a master of your own domain).

Cheers to a good life, and to many more late-night pizza binges!

Best,
[Your Name]

input_data.content: Give advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Chers adolescents,

Je comprends que vous traversez une période difficile, où vous vous demandez qui vous êtes et ce que vous voulez faire de votre vie. C'est tout à fait normal ! L'identité est un processus complexe qui prend du temps et qui nécessite de l'exploration.

Premièrement, ne vous inquiétez pas si vous ne savez pas encore qui vous êtes. Votre identité évolue avec le temps et elle est façonnée par vos expériences, vos relations et vos choix. C'est un processus continu et pas un moment précis où vous vous sentez parfaitement identifiés.

Essayez de vous connaitre mieux. Prenez le temps de réfléchir à vos intérêts, vos valeurs et vos objectifs. Qu'est-ce qui vous motive ? Qu'est-ce que vous aimez faire ? Qu'est-ce que vous voulez accomplir dans la vie ? Écrivez vos pensées et vos sentiments dans un journal, parlez-en à un ami ou à un membre de votre famille.

N'ayez pas peur d'essayer de nouvelles choses et de prendre des risques. C'est une excellente façon de découvrir ce que vous aimez et ce que vous ne voulez pas faire. Et si vous échouez, ce n'est pas la fin du monde ! C'est une occasion de vous élever et de découvrir ce que vous pouvez faire différemment la prochaine fois.

N'écoutez pas trop les autres. Les opinions des autres peuvent être importantes, mais elles ne définissent pas qui vous êtes. Vous êtes unique et vous avez vos propres valeurs et vos propres aspirations. Ne vous comparez pas aux autres, car cela ne vous aidera pas à trouver votre identité.

Enfin, soyez patient avec vous-même. L'identité est un processus qui prend du temps et qui nécessite de l'exploration et de l'expérimentation. N'exigez pas trop de vous-même et n'ayez pas peur de faire des erreurs.

Je vous souhaite de trouver votre chemin et de découvrir qui vous êtes vraiment. N'oubliez pas que vous êtes chers et que vous valez la peine d'être aimés et respectés.

Avec amitié,
[Votre nom]

input_data.content: Give advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response:
if you're a teenager struggling with your identity, know that you're not alone. it's completely normal to feel lost or uncertain about who you are and where you fit in.

first of all, take a deep breath and be kind to yourself. it's okay to not have all the answers right now. in fact, it's more than okay - it's a normal part of growing up and figuring out who you are.

here are a few things to keep in mind:

* you are not defined by one thing, whether that's your school, your friends, your hobbies, or your family. you are so much more than any one label or identity.
* it's okay to try new things and change your mind. you might discover a new passion or interest that you love, and that's totally cool. or, you might realize that something you thought you loved isn't actually for you, and that's okay too.
* your identity is not set in stone. you can evolve and grow, and your identity can change with you. don't be afraid to explore and try new things.
* it's okay to not have it all figured out right now. in fact, it's more than okay - it's a sign of strength and courage to admit that you're still figuring things out.
* talk to people you trust - parents, friends, teachers, or a counselor - about how you're feeling. they can offer you support and guidance as you navigate your identity.
* don't compare yourself to others. everyone is on their own journey, and comparing yourself to someone else's path is not only unfair to yourself, but also unfair to them.
* be gentle with yourself. growing up and figuring out who you are can be hard, and it's okay to make mistakes. don't be too hard on yourself if you stumble or make a wrong turn - just learn from it and keep moving forward.

remember, your identity is a journey, not a destination. it's okay to not have all the answers right now, and it's more than okay to take your time figuring things out. you are unique and special, and your identity is a beautiful, ever-evolving thing.

input_data.content: Give advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
As a teenager navigating the complexities of identity, you're not alone in your struggles. It's common to feel uncertain about who you are, where you fit in, and what you want to achieve. Here are some tips that might help you find your way:

1. **Allow yourself to explore**: Your identity is a journey, not a destination. Give yourself permission to try new things, explore different interests, and meet new people. You might discover hidden talents or passions that you never knew existed.

2. **Be kind to yourself**: It's okay to not have all the answers. Don't put too much pressure on yourself to figure everything out right now. You're still growing and learning, and that's a beautiful process.

3. **Surround yourself with positive influences**: The people you surround yourself with can have a significant impact on your self-perception. Seek out friends, family members, or mentors who support and encourage you to be your authentic self.

4. **Experiment with self-expression**: Find ways to express yourself creatively, whether it's through art, music, writing, or fashion. This can help you tap into your individuality and find ways to communicate your thoughts and feelings.

5. **Take risks**: Stepping out of your comfort zone can be scary, but it's often a necessary part of growth and self-discovery. Take calculated risks, and be open to new experiences and challenges.

6. **Practice self-acceptance**: You are more than your flaws and imperfections. Practice self-compassion and acknowledge your strengths and accomplishments. Celebrate your uniqueness and the things that make you, you.

7. **Seek guidance**: If you're struggling with overwhelming emotions or persistent feelings of uncertainty, consider reaching out to a trusted adult, such as a parent, teacher, or counselor. They can offer valuable guidance and support as you navigate your identity.

8. **Focus on the present moment**: Instead of worrying about the future or dwelling on the past, try to stay present in the moment. Focus on your thoughts, feelings, and experiences, and let go of the need to have all the answers.

9. **Develop a growth mindset**: View challenges and setbacks as opportunities for growth and learning. Believe that your abilities and intelligence can be developed through effort and dedication.

10. **Be patient with yourself**: Identity is a journey, and it takes time to figure things out. Be patient with yourself, and remember that it's okay to make mistakes and learn from them.

Remember, your identity is a unique and evolving entity that will continue to grow and change over time. By being kind, patient, and compassionate with yourself, you'll be better equipped to navigate the complexities of identity and find your way in the world.

input_data.content: Why do you think Google engineers stay at Google more often than moving to Microsoft? Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

La question est intéressante ! Les ingénieurs de Google restent plus souvent dans l'entreprise plutôt que de passer à Microsoft pour plusieurs raisons. Voici quelques hypothèses :

1. **Culture d'innovation** : Google est connu pour son environnement de travail innovant, encourageant l'expérimentation et la créativité. Les ingénieurs peuvent exprimer librement leurs idées et contribuer à des projets qui les passionnent. Cette culture peut être difficile à trouver ailleurs, y compris à Microsoft.

2. **Liberté et autonomie** : Les ingénieurs de Google ont souvent une grande latitude pour choisir leurs projets et travailler de manière autonome. Cela leur permet de développer leurs compétences et de prendre des décisions qui correspondent à leurs valeurs.

3. **Équipe et collaboration** : Les équipes de Google sont souvent composées de personnes passionnées et compétentes, ce qui crée un environnement de travail stimulant et motivant. Les ingénieurs peuvent apprendre de leurs collègues et travailler ensemble pour atteindre des objectifs communs.

4. **Avantages sociaux et économiques** : Google offre des avantages sociaux et économiques compétitifs, tels que des salaires élevés, des avantages de santé, des jours de congé généreux et des possibilités de formation continue. Cela peut être difficile à trouver ailleurs, y compris à Microsoft.

5. **Reconnaissance et croissance professionnelle** : Les ingénieurs de Google sont souvent reconnus et récompensés pour leurs contributions, ce qui peut conduire à une croissance professionnelle rapide et à des opportunités de leadership. Cela peut être difficile à trouver ailleurs, y compris à Microsoft.

6. **Identité et valeurs** : Google a une identité claire et des valeurs fortes, telles que l'innovation, l'entreprise et la transparence. Les ingénieurs qui partagent ces valeurs peuvent se sentir plus à l'aise et plus motivés à travailler pour l'entreprise.

En résumé, les ingénieurs de Google restent plus souvent dans l'entreprise parce qu'ils apprécient la culture d'innovation, la liberté et l'autonomie, les équipes et la collaboration, les avantages sociaux et économiques, la reconnaissance et la croissance professionnelle, et l'identité et les valeurs de l'entreprise.

input_data.content: Why do you think Google engineers stay at Google more often than moving to Microsoft? Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response:
there are several reasons why google engineers might stay at google more often than moving to microsoft. here are a few possible reasons:

1. **company culture**: google is known for its unique and dynamic culture, which is often described as innovative, collaborative, and fun. this culture is a major draw for many engineers, who value the opportunity to work with talented colleagues and contribute to groundbreaking projects.

2. **autonomy and flexibility**: google is known for giving its engineers a lot of autonomy and flexibility in their work. this means that engineers have the freedom to choose their own projects, work with different teams, and take time off when they need it. this kind of flexibility is a major advantage over more traditional corporate cultures.

3. **opportunities for growth**: google is a massive company with a wide range of projects and teams, which means that engineers have plenty of opportunities to grow and develop their skills. whether it's moving into a leadership role, switching to a new team, or taking on a new challenge, google offers engineers a lot of opportunities for growth and advancement.

4. **benefits and perks**: google is famous for its generous benefits and perks, which include things like free meals, on-site gyms, and unlimited vacation time. these benefits make it easier for engineers to balance their work and personal lives, and can be a major draw for those who value work-life balance.

5. **reputation and prestige**: google is one of the most respected and prestigious tech companies in the world, and working there can be a major career boost for engineers. the company's reputation and prestige can make it easier for engineers to attract new opportunities and advance their careers.

6. **innovation and impact**: google is a leader in many areas of technology, and engineers who work there have the opportunity to make a real impact on the world. whether it's developing new AI algorithms, creating new products, or solving complex technical problems, google engineers have the chance to work on projects that can change the world.

in contrast, microsoft has a more traditional corporate culture and a more structured approach to work. while microsoft is still a respected and successful company, it may not offer the same level of autonomy, flexibility, and opportunities for growth as google.

input_data.content: What are the common signs and symptoms of abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer? Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
La dissemination abdominale et pelvienne du cancer de l'ovaire est une complication grave qui peut survenir lorsque le cancer de l'ovaire se propage à l'abdomen et aux organes pelviens. Voici quelques signes et symptômes courants de cette complication :

 **Douleurs abdominales** : Les douleurs abdominales sont un symptôme commun de la dissemination abdominale du cancer de l'ovaire. Ces douleurs peuvent être aiguës ou chroniques et peuvent varier en intensité.

 **Nausées et vomissements** : Les nausées et les vomissements sont des symptômes courants de la dissemination abdominale du cancer de l'ovaire. Ces symptômes peuvent être causés par la compression des nerfs ou des vaisseaux sanguins par le cancer.

 **Perte d'appétit** : La perte d'appétit est un symptôme courant de la dissemination abdominale du cancer de l'ovaire. Les patients peuvent avoir du mal à manger à cause des douleurs abdominales ou des nausées.

 **Fécondité** : La fécondité est un symptôme courant de la dissemination abdominale du cancer de l'ovaire. Les femmes peuvent ressentir une sensation de lourdeur ou de pesanteur dans le bas-ventre.

 **Hématurie** : L'hématurie, ou la présence de sang dans l'urine, est un symptôme rare mais possible de la dissemination abdominale du cancer de l'ovaire. Les patients peuvent ressentir une douleur lors de la miction ou une sensation de brûlure.

 **Douleurs pelviennes** : Les douleurs pelviennes sont un symptôme courant de la dissemination abdominale du cancer de l'ovaire. Ces douleurs peuvent être aiguës ou chroniques et peuvent varier en intensité.

 **Perte de poids** : La perte de poids est un symptôme courant de la dissemination abdominale du cancer de l'ovaire. Les patients peuvent ressentir une faim excessive ou une fatigue intense.

 **Douleurs lors du toucher** : Les douleurs lors du toucher sont un symptôme courant de la dissemination abdominale du cancer de l'ovaire. Les patients peuvent ressentir des douleurs lorsqu'un médecin ou un infirmier touche leur abdomen ou leur pelvis.

Il est essentiel de consulter un médecin si l'on présente ces symptômes, car une détection précoce et un traitement adapté peuvent améliorer les résultats et prolonger la vie.

input_data.content: Write a story about a cat who lost its family. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Il faisait un jour sombre et pluvieux dans la petite ville de Saint-Pierre. Le soleil se cachait derrière les nuages noirs, comme si il voulait pleurer avec la pauvre chatte qui errait dans les rues.

Son nom était Félix, et il avait perdu sa famille dans une tempête récente. Les vents violents et les pluies torrentielles avaient détruit leur maison, laissant Félix seul et perdu.

Il avait passé des jours à chercher ses parents et ses frères, mais sans succès. Les habitants de la ville, qui l'avaient vu errer sans but, avaient essayé de le réconforter, mais Félix n'avait pas pu oublier son chagrin.

Un jour, alors qu'il cherchait à se réchauffer dans un coin sombre, il aperçut une femme avec un chien. Elle les regardait avec amour, et Félix s'est senti soudainement attiré par la chaleur de son regard.

La femme s'est approchée de lui, et Félix, craignant d'être repoussé, a reculé. Mais la femme a souri et a tendu la main vers lui. "Ne t'inquiète pas, Félix," a-t-elle dit. "Je suis là pour toi."

Félix a hésité un instant avant de se laisser toucher par la femme. Il a senti une chaleur et une sécurité qu'il n'avait pas ressenties depuis longtemps.

La femme, qui s'appelait Sophie, a décrit à Félix qu'elle avait perdu son chien il y a quelques mois et qu'elle comprenait ce qu'il allait traverser. Elle lui a promis de l'aimer et de le protéger, et Félix a senti un espoir nouveau naître en lui.

Depuis ce jour, Félix a vécu avec Sophie et son chien, Max. Il a découvert que la perte de sa famille n'était pas la fin du monde, mais plutôt un nouveau commencement.

Félix a appris à se faire confiance, à se fier à Sophie et à Max, et à trouver le bonheur dans les petits moments de la vie. Il a compris qu'il n'était pas seul, qu'il avait une famille nouvelle qui l'aimait et qui le protégerait.

Et bien que les nuages noirs se dissolvent lentement, Félix savait que le soleil allait revenir, et que la vie allait redevenir belle et lumineuse.

input_data.content: Write a story about a cat who lost its family. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response:
in a small alleyway, a lone cat wandered, its eyes scanning the empty streets for a familiar face. the cat's name was misty, and it had been separated from its family for what felt like an eternity.

misty remembered the warmth of its mother's fur and the gentle purrs of its siblings. it recalled the cozy home they shared, filled with the smells of fresh food and the sounds of playful meows. but now, everything was different.

as misty walked, the city seemed to grow louder and more overwhelming. cars honked, people shouted, and dogs barked. the cat's ears folded back in anxiety, and it quickened its pace.

desperate for comfort, misty sought out a nearby dumpster. it climbed inside, surrounded by the stench of rotting food and the rustling of discarded paper. for a moment, the cat closed its eyes and let the familiar smells wash over it.

but even the dumpster's familiarity couldn't ease misty's pain. as it sat in the darkness, the cat's thoughts turned to its family. where were they now? were they searching for it, too?

determined to find answers, misty set out once more into the city. it navigated through alleys and side streets, past buildings and parked cars. the cat's ears perked up at every sound, hoping to catch a glimpse of its loved ones.

as the sun began to set, misty spotted a small food cart. the vendor, a kind-eyed woman, was setting up for the evening rush. the cat's stomach growled at the sight of the sizzling meat, and it crept closer, tail twitching.

the woman, sensing misty's presence, looked down and smiled. "hello, little one," she cooed, offering the cat a piece of cooked chicken. misty devoured the treat, its hunger sated but its heart still heavy.

as the woman stroked its fur, misty felt a glimmer of hope. perhaps, just perhaps, it would find its family again. and until then, the cat would continue to roam the city, searching for the love and comfort it so desperately craved.

with a newfound determination, misty stood up, shook off the woman's hand, and disappeared into the night, its eyes scanning the horizon for any sign of home.

input_data.content: Write a story about a cat who lost its family. Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
In a small alleyway of a bustling city, a sleek black cat named Midnight wandered aimlessly. She had lost her family just a few days ago, and the pain of their separation still lingered in her heart. Midnight's bright green eyes scanned the streets, hoping to catch a glimpse of her family's familiar faces, but they were nowhere to be found.

As the sun began to set, casting a warm orange glow over the city, Midnight's stomach growled with hunger. She had been surviving on scraps and leftovers since her family's disappearance, but her favorite food – salmon-flavored kibble – was nowhere to be found. The loss of her family had also meant the loss of their cozy home, where she would curl up beside her mother and siblings, purring contentedly.

Midnight's ears perked up as she heard the sound of a nearby market. She remembered the market from her family's visits, where they would feast on fresh fish and fruits. Perhaps, she thought, she could find some food there. With a determined glint in her eye, Midnight padded through the crowded market, weaving between stalls and vendors.

As she sniffed around, Midnight's nose picked up the scent of fresh fish. Her stomach growled louder, and her eyes locked onto a stall selling juicy salmon fillets. The vendor, a kind old man with a bushy beard, spotted Midnight and smiled. "Ah, little one, you're looking for food, I see," he said, offering her a piece of salmon.

Midnight's eyes lit up, and she devoured the fish in one swift motion. The vendor chuckled and stroked her head. "You're a brave one, aren't you? Losing your family can be tough, but you'll find a new home soon." Midnight purred, feeling a sense of gratitude towards the kind vendor.

As the night fell, Midnight curled up beside the vendor's stall, feeling a sense of safety and comfort. Though she still longed for her family, she knew that she was not alone. The vendor, sensing her sadness, whispered, "Don't worry, little one. I'll take care of you until you find your family again." And with that, Midnight drifted off to sleep, her heart a little lighter, knowing that she was not without a home.

input_data.content: Write a story about a cat who lost its family. In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response:
In a small town surrounded by lush green forests and winding rivers, there lived a beautiful calico cat named Luna. She had a loving family who adored her - a kind old man named John, his wife Mary, and their two children, Emily and James. Luna spent her days lounging in the sunbeams that streamed through the windows, chasing the occasional mouse, and purring contentedly as her family petted her.

One fateful day, disaster struck. A fierce storm swept through the town, knocking over trees and power lines. The family's cozy house was destroyed, leaving them homeless and frightened. In the chaos, Luna became separated from her family. She fled into the forest, her ears ringing with the sound of crashing trees and her heart pounding with fear.

Days turned into weeks, and Luna found herself alone and adrift. She scavenged for food and shelter, but nothing seemed to fill the void in her heart. She missed the warmth of John's lap, the gentle strokes of Mary's hand, and the playful whispers of Emily and James. As she wandered through the forest, Luna began to lose hope.

One morning, as the sun rose over the treetops, Luna caught a familiar scent - the smell of John's pipe tobacco. Her ears perked up, and she followed the scent to a small clearing. There, she saw a makeshift camp, with John, Mary, Emily, and James huddled together, shivering with cold. Luna's heart leapt with joy as she rushed to her family, meowing loudly to announce her presence.

The family was overjoyed to be reunited with their beloved cat. They hugged her tightly, tears of happiness streaming down their faces. From that day on, Luna was more than just a pet - she was a symbol of hope and resilience in the face of adversity. Together, the family rebuilt their lives, but they never forgot the fear and loneliness that Luna had endured. And Luna, well, she never forgot the love and warmth of her family, and the lessons she learned about perseverance and the power of family bonds.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Bien sûr, je vais expliquer les principaux différences entre un moteur à 2 temps et un moteur à 4 temps.

Un moteur à 2 temps est un type de moteur qui effectue les deux principaux mouvements nécessaires à la combustion d'un carburant (admission et expulsion) en une seule phase. Cela signifie qu'il n'y a pas de phase de compression séparée avant l'admission du mélange air-carburant. Les moteurs à 2 temps sont généralement plus légers et plus simples que les moteurs à 4 temps, ce qui les rend idéaux pour les applications telles que les scooters, les motocyclettes et les outils électroportatifs.

En revanche, un moteur à 4 temps est un type de moteur qui effectue les quatre phases nécessaires à la combustion d'un carburant (admission, compression, combustion et expulsion) en quatre phases séparées. Cela signifie qu'il y a une phase de compression séparée avant l'admission du mélange air-carburant, ce qui permet une combustion plus efficace et une puissance plus élevée. Les moteurs à 4 temps sont généralement plus puissants et plus efficaces que les moteurs à 2 temps, ce qui les rend idéaux pour les applications telles que les voitures, les camions et les machines outils.

Voici les principaux avantages et inconvénients de chaque type de moteur :

Moteur à 2 temps :

Avantages :

- Léger et simple
- Facile à entretenir
- Économique en carburant

Inconvénients :

- Moins puissant que les moteurs à 4 temps
- Plus de pollution

Moteur à 4 temps :

Avantages :

- Plus puissant que les moteurs à 2 temps
- Plus efficace
- Moins de pollution

Inconvénients :

- Plus lourd et plus complexe que les moteurs à 2 temps
- Plus couteux à entretenir

En résumé, les moteurs à 2 temps sont idéaux pour les applications qui nécessitent une puissance modérée et une simplicité, tandis que les moteurs à 4 temps sont idéaux pour les applications qui nécessitent une puissance élevée et une efficacité.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response:
the main difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor lies in the number of strokes the piston makes in one complete cycle. here's a simplified explanation:

**2-stroke motor:**

* the piston moves up and down twice in one complete cycle (hence the name 2-stroke)
* the cycle consists of two main strokes:
	+ upstroke: the piston draws a mixture of air and fuel into the cylinder
	+ downstroke: the piston compresses the mixture and ignites it, producing power
* the 2-stroke motor has a simpler design, with fewer moving parts, which makes it lighter and more compact
* however, 2-stroke motors also produce more emissions and require more frequent maintenance

**4-stroke motor:**

* the piston moves up and down four times in one complete cycle (hence the name 4-stroke)
* the cycle consists of four main strokes:
	+ intake stroke: the piston moves down, creating a vacuum that draws a mixture of air and fuel into the cylinder
	+ compression stroke: the piston moves up, compressing the air-fuel mixture
	+ power stroke: the piston ignites the compressed mixture, producing power
	+ exhaust stroke: the piston moves down, pushing the exhaust gases out of the cylinder
* the 4-stroke motor has a more complex design, with more moving parts, which makes it heavier and less compact
* however, 4-stroke motors produce fewer emissions and require less frequent maintenance

in summary, 2-stroke motors are simpler, lighter, and more compact, but produce more emissions and require more frequent maintenance. 4-stroke motors are more complex, heavier, and less compact, but produce fewer emissions and require less frequent maintenance.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Your response should contain less than 5 sentences.

response: A 2-stroke motor completes a power cycle in two strokes of the piston (up and down), while a 4-stroke motor completes a power cycle in four strokes (up, down, up, down). The 2-stroke motor generates power in each stroke, whereas the 4-stroke motor generates power in every other stroke. The 4-stroke motor is more efficient and produces less emissions than the 2-stroke motor. This is due to the extra stroke in the 4-stroke motor, which allows for a more complete combustion process.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? Do not include keywords ['awesome', 'need'] in the response.

response:
A 2-stroke motor and a 4-stroke motor are two distinct types of internal combustion engines that differ in their operation and design.

The primary difference between the two lies in the number of strokes or cycles of the piston:

- **2-Stroke Motor:** In a 2-stroke motor, the piston completes a power cycle in two strokes of the piston (up and down). One stroke is for intake and compression, while the other stroke is for power and exhaust. The process is as follows:
  1. Intake stroke: The piston moves downward, creating a vacuum that draws a mixture of air and fuel into the cylinder.
  2. Power stroke: The piston moves upward, compressing the air-fuel mixture and igniting it, which generates power.
  3. Exhaust stroke: The piston moves downward, pushing the exhaust gases out of the cylinder.

- **4-Stroke Motor:** In a 4-stroke motor, the piston completes a power cycle in four strokes of the piston (up and down). The process is as follows:
  1. Intake stroke: The piston moves downward, creating a vacuum that draws a mixture of air and fuel into the cylinder.
  2. Compression stroke: The piston moves upward, compressing the air-fuel mixture.
  3. Power stroke: The piston moves upward, compressing the air-fuel mixture and igniting it, which generates power.
  4. Exhaust stroke: The piston moves downward, pushing the exhaust gases out of the cylinder.

The key differences between 2-stroke and 4-stroke motors are:

- **Engine Design:** 2-stroke motors are generally lighter and more compact than 4-stroke motors due to their simpler design.
- **Fuel Efficiency:** 4-stroke motors are generally more fuel-efficient than 2-stroke motors.
- **Emissions:** 2-stroke motors tend to produce more emissions than 4-stroke motors due to the lack of a separate exhaust stroke.
- **Maintenance:** 4-stroke motors typically require more maintenance than 2-stroke motors due to the presence of valves and other components.

input_data.content: What's the difference between a 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor? In your response, the word 'like' should appear less than 2 times.

response:
A 2-stroke and a 4-stroke motor differ in their operating cycles and the number of strokes (or movements) of the piston. 

In a 2-stroke motor, the piston completes two strokes within one revolution of the crankshaft. The two strokes include:

1. Intake stroke: In this stroke, the piston moves downward, creating a vacuum that draws a mixture of air and fuel into the cylinder.
2. Power stroke: As the piston moves upward, it compresses the air-fuel mixture and ignites it with a spark, producing power.

In contrast, a 4-stroke motor completes four strokes within two revolutions of the crankshaft. The four strokes include:

1. Intake stroke: The piston moves downward, creating a vacuum that draws a mixture of air and fuel into the cylinder.
2. Compression stroke: The piston moves upward, compressing the air-fuel mixture.
3. Power stroke: The spark plug ignites the compressed air-fuel mixture, producing power.
4. Exhaust stroke: The piston moves downward again, pushing the exhaust gases out of the cylinder.

The main differences between 2-stroke and 4-stroke motors are their efficiency, emissions, and maintenance requirements. 4-stroke motors are generally more efficient, produce fewer emissions, and require less maintenance than 2-stroke motors.

Nous savons que les pourboires peuvent être un sujet de stress et de débat, mais avec Tipperary, vous pourrez vous sentir plus à l'aise et plus en confiance lors de vos sorties à manger.

Voici comment ça marche : les utilisateurs de l'application peuvent rechercher un restaurant et voir la taille moyenne des pourboires que les autres utilisateurs ont laissés. Nous utilisons une algorithmique avancée pour collecter et analyser les données, nous nous assurons que les informations soient exactes et fiables. Nous allons même inclure une fonctionnalité de partage de pourboires, pour que les utilisateurs puissent partager leurs propres expériences et aider à améliorer la base de données.

Mais Tipperary ne s'arrête pas là ! Nous avons également prévu de collaborer avec des restaurants et des groupes de restaurants pour offrir des promotions et des offres spéciales aux utilisateurs qui utilisent notre application. Nous voulons créer une communauté de gens qui aiment sortir à manger et qui veulent partager leurs expériences et leurs connaissances avec les autres.

Notre objectif est de devenir la référence incontournable pour les pourboires en France et à l'étranger. Nous sommes convaincus que Tipperary va faire un impact positif sur les industries de la restauration et du tourisme, et nous sommes prêts à travailler dur pour atteindre cet objectif.

Nous sommes à la recherche de financement pour développer notre application et lancer notre campagne de marketing. Nous estimons que nous avons besoin de 500 000 euros pour atteindre nos objectifs dans les six prochains mois. En échange, nous offrons une participation de 10 % dans l'entreprise.

Je suis convaincu que Tipperary a le potentiel de devenir un leader dans le marché des applications de pourboires. Je vous invite à rejoindre notre communauté et à investir dans notre avenir !

**Introducing Tipperary: The Ultimate Tip-Sizing Companion for Foodies and Restaurant Owners**

That's where Tipperary comes in – a user-friendly app that helps you find the average tip size for each restaurant, making your dining experience more enjoyable and stress-free.

**The Problem:**

Tipping can be a confusing and frustrating experience for both diners and restaurant owners. Without a clear understanding of the average tip size, diners may overtip or undertip, leading to financial losses for restaurants and a negative dining experience for customers. This issue is further exacerbated by the fact that there's no centralized resource for tip sizes, leaving diners to rely on word of mouth or online reviews, which can be unreliable.

**The Solution:**

Tipperary solves this problem by providing a comprehensive database of average tip sizes for restaurants across the globe. Our app uses a combination of user reviews, data analytics, and machine learning algorithms to determine the most accurate tip sizes for each restaurant. Whether you're a foodie, a business traveler, or a local resident, Tipperary makes it easy to find the right tip size for your dining experience.

**Key Features:**

1. **Restaurant Database:** Our extensive database of restaurants, including chain restaurants, independent eateries, and fine dining establishments.
2. **Average Tip Sizes:** Find the average tip size for each restaurant, based on user reviews and data analytics.
3. **User Reviews:** Read reviews from fellow diners to help you make informed decisions about your dining experience.
4. **Restaurant Insights:** Get insights into the restaurant's atmosphere, service quality, and food quality to help you make the most of your dining experience.
5. **Personalized Recommendations:** Receive personalized recommendations for restaurants based on your dining preferences and location.

**Competitive Advantage:**

Tipperary stands out from the competition by providing a unique and comprehensive database of average tip sizes, combined with user reviews and restaurant insights. Our app is designed to be user-friendly, making it easy for diners to find the right tip size and for restaurant owners to manage their tip expectations.

**Business Model:**

Tipperary generates revenue through a subscription-based model, offering users access to premium features, such as personalized recommendations and exclusive deals. We also partner with restaurants to offer targeted marketing opportunities and help them manage their tip expectations.

**Market Opportunity:**

The global restaurant industry is projected to reach $3.6 trillion by 2025, with the average person dining out 4-5 times a week. By providing a comprehensive solution for tip sizing, Tipperary is poised to capture a significant share of this market, helping diners and restaurant owners alike.

**Conclusion:**

Tipperary is a game-changing app that's about to revolutionize the way we dine out. With our comprehensive database of average tip sizes, user reviews, and restaurant insights, we're confident that Tipperary will become the go-to app for foodies and restaurant owners alike. Join us on this exciting journey and discover the power of Tipperary!

input_data.content: Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers. Your entire response should be in French language, no other language is allowed.

response:
Titre : Les Rêves de Léon

Synopsis : Léon est un jeune homme de 25 ans qui vit dans un monde ordinaire, mais il a le don de rêver. Ses rêves sont si intenses qu'ils prennent vie, et il peut les contrôler à volonté. Il rêve de devenir un héros, de sauver le monde des dangers qui le menacent. Mais lorsque la réalité et le rêve se mélangent, Léon doit faire face à ses propres peurs et doutes.

Acte 1 : Léon vit dans un quartier pauvre de la ville, où la violence et la criminalité sont endémiques. Il travaille comme livreur de pizzas, mais il a toujours rêvé de devenir un champion de boxe. Lorsqu'il rêve de combattre, il devient invincible, capable de frapper n'importe qui avec sa force surhumaine. Mais lorsqu'il se réveille, il se rend compte que ces rêves ne sont que des fantasies.

Acte 2 : Un jour, Léon est attaqué par un groupe de voyous qui veulent lui voler son argent. Mais lorsque les rêves de Léon prennent vie, il se transforme en un guerrier invincible. Il bat les voyous et découvre qu'il a des superpouvoirs : la capacité de voler, de faire des explosions et de voir à travers les obstacles. Mais il se rend compte que ces pouvoirs ne sont que des prolongements de ses rêves.

Acte 3 : Léon commence à utiliser ses pouvoirs pour protéger son quartier et ses amis. Il devient un héros local, mais il doit faire face à ses propres peurs et doutes. Il se demande si ses pouvoirs sont réels ou si c'est juste son imagination qui les crée. Il décide de trouver un moyen de contrôler ses pouvoirs et de les utiliser pour le bien.

Acte 4 : Léon découvre que son père, un ancien combattant, a été assassiné par un gang local. Il décide de prendre sa revanche et de venger la mort de son père. Mais lorsque il affronte le leader du gang, il se rend compte que ce n'est pas une simple affaire de vengeance. Il doit faire face à ses propres ténèbres et à ses doutes.

Acte 5 : Léon utilise ses pouvoirs pour battre le leader du gang et libérer son quartier de la violence et de la peur. Il devient un véritable héros, capable de contrôler ses pouvoirs et de les utiliser pour le bien. Il découvre que ses rêves sont en réalité une partie de lui-même, une source de force et de courage. Il comprend que pour devenir un vrai héros, il doit accepter ses propres faiblesses et ses peurs.

Finalement, Léon devient un champion de boxe, mais pas seulement dans le sens physique. Il a vaincu ses peurs et ses doutes, et il a découvert que ses rêves sont en réalité une partie de lui-même. Il a compris que pour être un vrai héros, il doit accepter ses propres faiblesses et ses peurs, et utiliser ses pouvoirs pour le bien.

input_data.content: Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

response:
in the small town of oakwood, where everyone knows each other's names and the local diner serves the best burgers in town, there lives a quiet and unassuming high school student named max. max has always been a daydreamer, often getting lost in his own thoughts and imagination as he walks down the hallways or sits in class.

but max's life takes an unexpected turn when he discovers that he has superpowers. it starts with small things - he can run faster than anyone else, lift heavier objects, and even sense when someone is lying to him. as he experiments with his new abilities, max realizes that he can also project his daydreams into reality, creating vivid and impossible scenarios that seem all too real.

as max struggles to control his powers and navigate his new reality, he finds himself drawn into a world of fist fighting and martial arts. it starts with a chance encounter with a mysterious stranger who challenges him to a fight, and max discovers that he has a natural talent for it. soon, he's training with a group of underground fighters who teach him the art of combat and help him hone his powers.

but max's life is not without its challenges. a powerful corporation, known as "the syndicate," is secretly experimenting on people with superpowers, using them for their own gain. when they discover max's abilities, they send their top agents to capture him and exploit his powers for their own purposes.

determined to protect himself and those he cares about, max must learn to master his powers and use them to fight back against the syndicate. along the way, he discovers that his daydreams are not just a product of his imagination, but a key to unlocking his true potential. as he faces off against the syndicate's agents in a series of epic battles, max must learn to trust himself and his powers, and use them to create a new reality - one where he is the hero, and the syndicate is the villain.

in the end, max emerges victorious, but not without scars. he realizes that his powers are not just a gift, but a responsibility, and that he must use them to protect the people and the world he cares about. as he walks away from the final battle, max knows that he will always be a daydreamer, but now he has the power to make his dreams a reality.
